name: King of the Valley (fnelix)
description:
King of the Valley

A mini-roguelike with procedurally generated levels, turn-based movement and permadeath for Ludum Dare 52.

After you lost your harvest, you set out to find the king cactus for its fruit. There are some secrets strewn across the valley to help you on your quest.

Experimental mobile-ready version
Experimental version done after the compo and with onscreen control art by kenney.nl
